mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERS (orders_no, member_no, odate, price, address, receiver, phone, message, postcode, status) VALUES (#{ordersNo}, #{memberNo}, sysdate, #{price}, #{address}, #{receiver}, #{phone}, #{message}, #{postcode}, #{status} )
mapper.select: SELECT orders_no, member_no, odate, price, address, receiver, phone, message, postcode, status FROM orders WHERE orders_no = #{ordersNo}
SELECT orders_no, member_no, odate, price, address, receiver, phone, message, postcode, status FROM orders

SELECT o.orders_no, g.front_img as img, b.sizes, t.sizes, g.name, gp.price AS unit_price, o.price AS total_price, ol.qty, o.status FROM orders o, goods g, bottom b, tops t, gpurchase gp, order_list ol
g.goods_no = b.goods_no AND g.goods_no = t.goods_no AND g.goods_no = gp.goods_no AND gp.gpurchase_no = ol.gpurchase_no AND o.orders_no = ol.orders_no AND ol.bottom_no = b.bottom_no AND ol.tops_no = t.tops_no AND o.orders_no = #{ordersNo} AND ol.bottom_no = #{bottomNo} AND ol.tops_no = #{topsNo}

SELECT orders_no, member_no, odate, price, address, receiver, phone, message, postcode, status FROM orders WHERE member_no = #{memberNo} AND odate >= TO_DATE(#{start},'YY/MM/DD') AND odate <= TO_DATE(#{end}, 'YY/MM/DD')

SELECT o.orders_no, o.odate, o.price, o.address, o.receiver, o.phone, o.message, o.postcode, o.status, p.method, p.regdate AS "pdate", p.card_info, m.name FROM orders o, payment p, member m WHERE m.member_no = o.member_no AND o.orders_no = p.orders_no AND o.orders_no = #{value}
